channel.title: Proceedings on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Proceedings on Konigi

item.title: mobileHCI 2009 Proceedings
item.description: The full text of the proceedings of MobileHCI09, the 11th International Conference on Human-Computer Interaction with Mobile Devices and Services is available online. The event, which covers mobile and wearable computing devices and services took place September, 2009 at the University of Bonn in Germany. http://mobilehci.uni-siegen.de/mhci2009.html
